Others: The Knicks won the game with a score of 114-104.
Mikal Bridges scored 21 points and took a team-high 18 field goal attempts.
Karl-Anthony Towns led the Knicks with 26 points, 15 rebounds, and 6 assists.
OG Anunoby scored 24 points and Josh Hart scored 20 points.
Defensively, the Knicks allowed the Nets to shoot 41% from the three-point line.
The Knicks held Dennis Schroder to 2-11 shooting from the floor for 8 points.
Cam Thomas scored 16 points but shot 4-11 from the field.
